transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Ji meri baat Jai Prakash Jethi ji se ho rahi hai Nimbaza Energy mein?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay. So Jai Prakash ji, main Pallavi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se senior manager. Kaise hain aap, maja hai?
Customer: Bas achha hai mam.
Executive: Batao?
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Sir, Jai Prakash ji aap keh rahe hain ki aapko koi alag account manager chahiye, aapko hamare account manager se satisfied nahi hai?
Customer: Haan mam, maine wo Shivani madam ko rakha tha. Wo complaint bhi kiya tha, wapas karne ke liye same hi product. To kiya nahi abhi tak. Dusre ko assign kar diya aise hi.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Jo hamare account manager bhi pehle, teen-char mahine pehle, wo Shivani madam karke. Usko rakha tha. Uske baad usko nikal diya, IndiaMART pe hi hai. Theek hai? To iske baad do account manager assign kiye kuch kaam ke nahi hai. Usko bola ki aajaao wapas. IndiaMART pe hi bola. IndiaMART pe bhi bola ke mere ko wo Shivani madam se workout karwaiye. Ek to service ka kisi ko pata bhi nahi chalta. Jisko pata chalta hai wo karta nahi hai. Nahi karna ho to nahi karo dusra kya hai?
Aap bhi khali nahi baithe, hum bhi khali nahi baithe, hum bhi service ko bhi service de dusra kya hai? Aapko aisa lag raha hai ke nahi ho raha inse. To koi baat nahi hum bhi mana kar dete hai, aisa kya hai?
Aapki company bhi badi nahi hui hai aur hamari company bhi badi nahi hui hai. Dusra kya? Usme kya fark padta hai? Call kar denge, teen saal ka package hai already. Wo discontinue kar dete. Aur char mahine se to kuch service nahi mil rahi IndiaMART ki. Account manager hi badal rahe hai. Pata nahi kya kar rahe hai. Fresher koi bitha rahe hai kya kar rahe hai pata nahi. Aap senior manager ho, senior manager bhi fresher hai kya pata nahi.
Executive: Sir, ek baat bataiye agar koi bhi employee ho aapko IndiaMART ke bare mein jo bhi nayi cheeze aayi hai,
Uske bare mein hamara kaam hai aapko inform karna. Aapka catalog time to time update karna. Agar aapka jo bhi account manager hai agar wo nahi kar raha hai to aap mujhe complaint kar sakte hain. Mam, mam, mam, char mahine se kya hua? Mam, mam, mam, char mahine se mera kya hua hai kaam bataiye. Meri na lead aa rahi hai, na kuch aa rahi hai. Na energy aur India lead aa raha hai, kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai. Main wahi wo wahi pareshan hu ke aap assign kyu nahi kar rahe usko?
Executive: Sir, ek baat bataiye.
Customer: Assign karne mein kya problem hai? Wahi baat hui, possibility kya hai? Wo mail kiya, sara diya, baat chit kiya, wo dusra bhi hai, kya hai jawab hai? Wo IndiaMART pe hi hai. Dusra kya hai?
Executive: Sir, aisa nahi hota hai aap account manager.
Customer: Nahi nahi hota mam. Nahi mam, hota to hai. Mere ko pata hai hota to hai hi. Aap sirf bol bol ghumana chahte ho. Aap se meri pehle bhi to baat hui hai na. Wo wo wo pehle wo fresher thi, usne humko dala, abhi usko aa gaya mere product ke bare mein jankari ho gaya, uske expert ho gaya, dusre ko pakad liya. To hum to khaali baithe hai na. Hum fresher ko hi dhandhe mein baithe hai.
Hum to fresher ko hi jam jate hai. To paisa lete mast. Aur hum to fresher ko hi jarurat hai aapke. Aur aapko sirf wahi mithi mithi baatein karni hai bas senior manager. Aisa kar diya, wo kar diya, aisa kar diya. Kya fark padta hai mam? Main pareshan ho raha hu. To aap kar diya chalo. Do mahine ke baad dusra assign kar diya. Pagal bana ke rakha hai.
To continuous service aa rahi hai hamari. Continuous paisa bhi de rahe hai. Aise nahi ke ek saal ke baad chhod diya ho. Aur wo bhi pehle teen saal se pehle ka hai, ek aath mahine pehle service book karwa diya teen saal ka. Wo aapko kuch nahi hai. Hame service kya hai mere ko bataiye na. Aap sunti hi ho, kuch karte nahi ho mam aap.
Executive: Sir, aap chilla rahe hain bataiye, main kya solution du aapko?
Customer: Haan to chillaunga nahi na mam. Chilla rahe se aapko solution ho jayega sir.
Haan to mere ko account mere ko wapas de dijiye, wahi mail kiya hai message. To aapko padhne mein kya hai? To mera discontinue kar dijiye, mera cancel kar dijiye aap.
Hello.
Executive: Haan, bataiye ji.
Customer: Mera cancel kar dijiye wo jo continuation mein hai na, wo wo wo mere ko, main abhi abhi main chilla raha hu na main, mere ko wo continuation mein hai na, wo mere ko delete kar dijiye. Main main IndiaMART ki service provide nahi karwaunga abhi. Abhi nahi karta main. Wo abhi dobara ek baar baat. Sir, sir, sir chillaiye mat, aaram se baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Main chillata nahi hu mam. Theek hai. Aap samajhte nahi ho. Aapke paas solution to nahi hai kuch bhi.
Executive: Sir, ab aap mujhe time to dijiye. Main dobara, arey sir aap meri baat to suniye. Main bol to rahi hu ki main try karti hu, main senior se baat kar leti hu agar possibility hogi to aapko inform kar dungi.
Customer: Mam, aapke senior, aapke senior ne wo char. Sir aap fir chilla rahe hain. Jab main aap hi ki baat ka ek samadhan. Aapko char mahine nikal gaye na mam. Calm down ho jayega. Main aapki baat to sunne de rahe ho.
Mam, aapki jab mein salary aa jati hai. Theek hai, mere ko IndiaMART se koi problem nahi hai abhi. Sir, sir aap galat direction mein ja rahe hain.
Customer: Haan to sahi hai na, wahi cheez hai na. To isse aapko solution. Hamara pet bhara nahi hai mam. Hum hum hum IndiaMART ko better bhi nahi dete. Jai Prakash ji, maine kaha na sir mujhe mujhe time dijiye ek minute dene ka. Ek baar main dobara management se baat kar leti hu. Agar kuch usme possibility hogi, main aapko inform kar dungi. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Aur jo person hai na, aapko dusra assign karna hai na jo person rahega na, uska mere ko CV chahiye. Wo kitne saal se IndiaMART pe hai, uska mere ko CV chahiye. Aur wo IndiaMART pe utna rahega. Wo IndiaMART pe utna rahega. Mere ko char saal ka experience wala person chahiye. Sir, abhi aap. Mere ko minimum char saal. Jai Prakash ji, aaram se baat kar lijiye sir. Aaram se baat kariye. Aap mujhe bataiye. Haan bataiye mam.
Executive: Sir, aap mujhe bolne to dijiye sir. Main bata raha hu, please.
Customer: Haan bataiye mam. Jai Prakash ji, abhi aapne meri first demand to rakh di ke aapne kaha ki mere ko purana account manager chahiye. Theek hai? Maine bhi kya aapka ab aap itna keh rahe hain to maine kaha main aap ek baar management se baat karti hu to aapko purana account manager se Shivani se main baat kar lu uske liye aap okay hai?
Customer: Mam, maine already wo unka bhi Shivani madam ka phone aaya tha. Wo bhi ready thi IndiaMART pe mail bhi ho gaya hai. Wo kitne kitna time hua wo bhi aap dekh sakte ho mam. To bhi assign nahi kar rahe mam. Sir, main sir jo main puch rahi hu aap bataiye. Aapko Shivani chahiye na aapka account manager? To main dobara ek baar baat karu apne management? Aap please haan ya na bataiye. Main top up. Ji kar lijiye. Jo usko nahi ho raha hai to mere ko paanch saal ka experience wala IndiaMART wala banda chahiye mere ko. Uska CV main main mere ko pata hona chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap keh rahe hain agar agar agar agar Shivani nahi hai aapke account manager to aapko experience wala chahiye IndiaMART se, yahi keh rahe hain?
Customer: Haan, haan. Paanch saal ka experience wala banda chahiye as a IndiaMART se ho. Uska mere ko CV chahiye. Dono mein se bilkul sir koshish karungi main dono mein se ek condition aapki maan jaunga. Theek hai? Theek hai mam. Theek hai. Aur jo service wala banda hona chahiye.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul sir no problem.
Executive: Service isliye jo bhi aapse baat karega, theek hai? Ek baar main baat kar leti hu. Sir aapko inform kar dungi. Aapko call kar raha hai bolta hua hai. Mam kab tak karenge kal tak? Main aapko haan kal tak phone kar lijiye sir no problem. Theek hai? Haan theek hai aap usko ye kya bolte hai mail pe dal dijiye main kal tak aapko reply kar dungi mam. Sir main call pe aap se baat hui hai. Meri ab main ab main khud baat karungi aapse. Ab to record mein rahega na. Record mein rahega mam. Mam record mein rahega.
Aapko bhi pata hona chahiye ke ye commitment kiya hua hai. Karungi aapko call na pehle. Aap commitment bhul jate ho mam. Ab mera number hai aap mera number save kar lijiye agar aapko karna hoga. Mam, mera nahi hai ye IndiaMART ka number hai mam. Ye IndiaMART ka number hai. Sir ye IndiaMART ka number hai ye mera number hai. Aap call karenge mere ko lagega. 8047245 aa raha hai wo to hai hi nahi koi. 95514. Haan 95514. Theek hai? Haan. Theek hai sir main aapko kal phone karti hu. Aap. Okay thank you. Theek hai mam. Dhanyavad aapka. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants Shivani madam as account manager.

- Dissatisfied with current account manager service.

- Wants to discontinue the current subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check possibility with management.

- Executive will inform about the decision.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, refund, subscription, service
